item.title: Federal judge orders Oakland airport to stop using ‘San Francisco’ in its name as the actual San Francisco sues it for trademark violation
item.description: U.S. Magistrate Judge Thomas Hixson on Tuesday issued an order agreeing with the copyright violation argument, saying San Francisco spent millions to ...

item.title: The next 4 years
item.description: With Republicans winning control of the House, President-elect Donald Trump will be heading to Washington with a clear path for enacting his agenda.

item.title: Burberry shares soar as new CEO Josh Schulman admits ‘lack of focus on outerwear,’ vowing to turn losses around
item.description: Burberry also plans to slash costs by millions and has set a lofty new revenue target under CEO Josh Schulman.

item.title: One thing Trump needs from Ukraine? Its anti-drone tech
item.description: Western nations remain startlingly unprepared for a new phase of terror enabled by individually targeted drones.

item.title: How Trump’s Agenda 47, plus Project 2025, offer clues into possible health-care policy changes
item.description: Donald Trump's Agenda 47 and the Heritage Foundation's Project 2025 provide plenty of clues into what health-care changes may be coming.
